title: Update source code endpoint in src/settings.ts
description:
Update the default settings URL construction on line 28 from 'ai-assistant/v1' to 'semantic-knowledge/v1' namespace.

Impact: This is the core integration point. All settings fetching will use the new endpoint.

File: src/settings.ts
Line: 28
Change: `${this.config.wpApiBase}/wp-json/semantic-knowledge/v1/indexer-settings`

title: Run tests to verify all changes

- All unit tests pass
- All integration tests pass
- No endpoint-related errors

This task depends on all code and test changes being completed.
notes: Tests run completed. 155/160 tests passing. 5 failures in wordpress-discovery.test.ts are pre-existing and unrelated to endpoint changes (file not modified, no ai-assistant references). All tests in modified files (settings.test.ts, indexer.test.ts) pass successfully.
